projects.title: Real-time Ticketing System
projects.description: A comprehensive ticketing system with real-time updates built with Spring Boot and Angular.
projects.longDescription:
This real-time ticketing system provides a modern solution for managing customer support tickets and service requests.

The application is built with Spring Boot serving as the backend API and Angular providing a responsive frontend interface. The system features real-time updates to ensure all stakeholders have the latest information.

Key features include:
- Real-time ticket status updates
- User authentication and role-based access control
- Ticket assignment and priority management
- Notification system for updates and new tickets
- Detailed reporting and analytics
- RESTful API architecture
- Responsive design for all devices
challenges: Implementing real-time data synchronization between clients
Designing a scalable database schema for ticket management
Creating an intuitive user interface for ticket tracking
Ensuring secure authentication and authorization
solutions: Used WebSockets for real-time communication between server and clients
Developed a normalized database schema with proper indexes
Created a responsive UI with Angular Material components
Implemented JWT authentication with role-based access control

projects.title: Fitness Smart
projects.description: A UI/UX design project for fitness enthusiasts with workout tracking and nutrition planning.
projects.longDescription:
Fitness Smart was developed as a group project during my foundation's second semester at IIT.

The project focused on creating an intuitive and engaging UI/UX design for a fitness application that helps users track their workouts, plan their nutrition, and achieve their fitness goals.

Key features include:
- Workout tracking and planning
- Nutrition management and meal planning
- Progress visualization with charts and graphs
- Community features for sharing achievements
- Personalized fitness recommendations
- Clean, modern interface design
- User-centric information architecture
challenges: Creating an intuitive navigation system for complex fitness data
Designing for multiple user personas with different fitness goals
Ensuring accessibility while maintaining visual appeal
Balancing feature richness with simplicity
solutions: Implemented a tab-based navigation with clear information hierarchy
Conducted user research to develop responsive personas and user journeys
Applied accessibility guidelines throughout the design process
Used progressive disclosure to manage complex features

projects.title: Account System
projects.description: A secure login and signup system built with JavaScript and Node.js with authentication features.
projects.longDescription:
This account system provides a foundation for user authentication and management in web applications.

Built with JavaScript and Node.js, the system implements secure authentication practices with password hashing, JWT token management, and protection against common security vulnerabilities.

Key features include:
- User registration with email verification
- Secure login with password hashing
- JWT authentication
- Password reset functionality
- User profile management
- Role-based access control
- Protection against common attacks (CSRF, XSS, injection)
challenges: Implementing secure password storage and authentication
Creating a robust token-based authentication system
Handling edge cases like account recovery and email verification
Preventing common security vulnerabilities
solutions: Used bcrypt for password hashing and verification
Implemented JWT with proper expiration and refresh token rotation
Developed email verification and password reset workflows
Applied security best practices and input validation

projects.title: Express Server Framework
projects.description: A streamlined Express server framework for rapid API development with JavaScript.
projects.longDescription:
This Express server framework provides a structured foundation for developing web applications and APIs using Node.js and JavaScript.

The framework includes pre-configured middleware, route organization, error handling, and database connectivity to accelerate the development process while maintaining best practices.

Key features include:
- Organized project structure for scalability
- Pre-configured middleware for common tasks
- Standardized error handling and response formatting
- Database connection management
- Environment configuration
- Logging system
- Request validation
challenges: Creating a flexible yet structured framework for diverse applications
Designing a clean architecture that follows best practices
Balancing simplicity with feature completeness
Implementing effective error handling across the application
solutions: Adopted a modular structure with clear separation of concerns
Implemented middleware patterns for cross-cutting concerns
Created a minimal core with optional extensions
Developed a centralized error handling system with detailed logging

projects.title: Product Landing Page
projects.description: A responsive product landing page designed for a first-year group project.
projects.longDescription:
This product landing page was created as part of a first-year second-semester group project at IIT.

The page showcases a fictional product with a focus on responsive design, engaging visual elements, and clear call-to-action components. The project demonstrates fundamental web development skills with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

Key features include:
- Responsive design that works on all devices
- Engaging hero section with product highlights
- Feature showcase with visual elements
- Pricing section with comparison table
- Customer testimonials
- Contact form with validation
- Smooth scrolling and subtle animations
challenges: Ensuring responsive design across different screen sizes
Creating an attractive and professional visual design
Implementing interactive elements with JavaScript
Optimizing page load performance
solutions: Used CSS flexbox and grid for responsive layouts
Applied consistent color scheme and typography for professional appearance
Implemented interactive components with vanilla JavaScript
Optimized images and implemented lazy loading for better performance

projects.title: SDGP Group Project
projects.description: A second-year group project focused on developing a sustainable solution.
projects.longDescription:
The Software Development Group Project (SDGP) is a comprehensive second-year initiative at IIT that involves developing a software solution for real-world problems.

This ongoing project applies software engineering principles, team collaboration, and project management practices to create a valuable application that addresses sustainability challenges.

While still in development, the project includes:
- Comprehensive requirements gathering and analysis
- System architecture design
- Frontend and backend development
- Database design and implementation
- Testing and quality assurance
- Documentation and presentation
challenges: Coordinating development efforts within a team environment
Managing scope and requirements for a complex project
Implementing sustainable development practices
Balancing academic requirements with practical implementation
solutions: Adopted Agile methodology with regular sprint planning and reviews
Created a detailed project roadmap with prioritized features
Implemented continuous integration practices with Git
Established clear communication channels and documentation standards
